import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import "../styles.css"; function ProctorSecure() { const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(false); const toggleDarkMode = () => { document.body.classList.toggle("dark-mode"); setDarkMode(!darkMode); }; useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { const sections = document.querySelectorAll( ".features-section, .how-it-works-section, .use-cases-section, .faq-section, .contact-section" ); sections.forEach((section) => { const rect = section.getBoundingClientRect(); if (rect.top < window.innerHeight - 100) { section.classList.add("section-visible"); } }); }; window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); }, []); const toggleAnswer = (e) => { const answer = e.currentTarget.nextElementSibling; const arrow = e.currentTarget.querySelector(".arrow"); if (answer.style.display === "block") { answer.style.display = "none"; arrow.style.transform = "rotate(0deg)"; } else { answer.style.display = "block"; arrow.style.transform = "rotate(180deg)"; } }; return ( <> {/* Hero Section */}
HoneSta
  • Features
  • How It Works
  • Use Cases

Integrity in Every Click, Confidence in Every Step.

A scalable, privacy-focused proctoring system designed for all institutions.

{/* Features Section */}

Key Features

Behavioral Monitoring

Detect suspicious activities through mouse movements, keystrokes, and window shifts.

Dynamic Risk Scoring

Real-time analytics calculate and adjust risk scores based on user behavior.

Privacy-First Design

GDPR and FERPA compliant—ensures no video or audio invasion during assessments.

Automated Alerts

Proactive notifications ensure timely interventions during flagged activities.

{/* How It Works Section */}

How It Works

Step 1

Sign Up securely as an admin, proctor, or candidate.

Step 2

Configure rules, schedules, and proctoring settings for assessments.

Step 3

Take the test with non-intrusive monitoring.

Step 4

Analyze results and ensure academic integrity.

{/* FAQs Section */}

FAQs

How does ProctorSecure ensure privacy? ▼

ProctorSecure avoids intrusive practices and complies with privacy laws.

Can ProctorSecure scale for large exams? ▼

Yes, it is designed for seamless large-scale operations.

{/* Contact Section */}

© 2025 ProctorSecure. All rights reserved.

Privacy Policy | Terms of Use
); } export default ProctorSecure;
